paper.title: Learning the semantics of words and pictures

author.org: Comput. Div., California Univ., Berkeley, CA, USA

keywords.keyword: Cognitive neuroscience of visual object recognition

paper.abstract: We present a statistical model for organizing image collections which integrates semantic information provided by associate text and visual information provided by image features. The model is very promising for information retrieval tasks such as database browsing and searching for images based on text and/or image features. Furthermore, since the model learns relationships between text and image features, it can be used for novel applications such as associating words with pictures, and unsupervised learning for object recognition.
